vernac_cmds: Require Import BellantoniCook.Lib BellantoniCook.MultiPoly BellantoniCook.Cobham BellantoniCook.CobhamLib BellantoniCook.CobhamUnary BellantoniCook.BC.
induction (hd nil l); simpl; try (case a); omega.
Lemma Pred_correct l : sem pred nil l = Sem Pred l.
Lemma cond'_correct l : sem cond nil l = Sem Cond l.
Definition move_arg (n i j:nat) (e:Cobham) : Cobham := Comp n e (move_forward i j (map (Proj n) (seq 0 n)) (Proj n 0)).
Lemma move_arg_inf n i j e : i+j < n -> arity e = ok_arity n -> arity (move_arg n i j e) = ok_arity n.
rewrite H0, length_move_forward, map_length, seq_length, <- beq_nat_refl; simpl.
case_eq (forallb (fun e0 : Arity => arity_eq e0 (ok_arity n)) (map arity (move_forward i j (map (Proj n) (seq 0 n)) (Proj n 0)))); trivial.
rewrite move_forward_map with (d1:=0) in H4 by trivial.
replace (arity (Proj n n'')) with (ok_arity n) in H2.
Lemma rec_bounded_move_arg : forall n i j e, rec_bounded' e -> rec_bounded' (move_arg n i j e).
intros n i j e H; simpl; split; trivial.
rewrite move_forward_map with (d1:=0), in_map_iff in H' by trivial.
destruct H' as [m [H1 _] ]; subst; simpl; trivial.
Lemma move_arg_correct n i j e l : length l = n -> Sem (move_arg n i j e) l = Sem e (move_forward i j l (Sem (Proj n 0) l)).
rewrite <- move_forward_map with (d2:= Sem (Proj n 0) l); trivial.
Definition dummies (n m : nat)(e : Cobham) : Cobham := Comp (n+m) e (map (Proj (n+m)) (seq 0 n)).
Lemma arity_dummies e n n' : arity e = ok_arity n' -> arity (dummies n' n e) = ok_arity (n + n').
destruct n' as [ | n']; intro H; simpl; rewrite H; simpl.
case_eq (forallb (fun e0 : Arity => arity_eq e0 (ok_arity (S (n' + n)))) (map arity (map (Proj (S (n' + n))) (seq 1 n')))); intro Hall.
Lemma rec_bounded_dummies : forall e n m, rec_bounded' e -> rec_bounded' (dummies n m e).
intros e n m H; simpl; split; trivial.
Lemma dummies_correct e n m l: n <= length l -> Sem (dummies n m e) l = Sem e (firstn n l).

Fixpoint BC_to_Cobham n s (e : BC) : Cobham := match e with | zero => Zero | proj n s i => Proj (n + s) i | succ b => Succ b | pred => Pred | cond => Cond | rec g h0 h1 => Rec (BC_to_Cobham (n - 1) s g) (move_arg (S (n+s)) 1 (n-1) (BC_to_Cobham n (S s) h0) ) (move_arg (S (n+s)) 1 (n-1) (BC_to_Cobham n (S s) h1) ) (Poly (pplus (psum n s) (poly_BC n e))) | comp n s h rl tl => Comp (n + s) (BC_to_Cobham (length rl) (length tl) h) (map (fun e => (dummies n s (BC_to_Cobham n 0 e))) rl ++ map (BC_to_Cobham n s) tl) end.
Lemma arity_BC_to_Cobham : forall (e : BC) n s, arities e = ok_arities n s -> arity (BC_to_Cobham n s e) = ok_arity (n + s).
rewrite <- minus_n_O, H2, H3, H4; auto; simpl.
cutrewrite (length (firstn n (map (Proj (S (S (n + s)))) (seq 2 (n + s))) ++ Proj (S (S (n + s))) 1 :: skipn n (map (Proj (S (S (n + s)))) (seq 2 (n + s)))) = n + S s).

case_eq (forallb (fun e : Arity => arity_eq e (ok_arity (S (S (n + s))))) (map arity (firstn n (map (Proj (S (S (n + s)))) (seq 2 (n + s))) ++ Proj (S (S (n + s))) 1 :: skipn n (map (Proj (S (S (n + s)))) (seq 2 (n + s)))))); intros; simpl.
apply eq_true_false_abs in H5; trivial; clear H5.
apply in_app_or in H6; destruct H6.
rewrite app_length, firstn_length, map_length, seq_length; simpl.
case_eq ( forallb (fun e : Arity => arity_eq e (ok_arity (n + s))) (map arity (map (fun e : BC => dummies n s (BC_to_Cobham n 0 e)) rl ++ map (BC_to_Cobham n s) tl))); intros; trivial.
Lemma BC_to_Cobham_correct : forall (e : BC) n s, arities e = ok_arities n s -> (forall xl yl, n = length xl -> s = length yl -> sem e xl yl = Sem (BC_to_Cobham n s e) (xl ++ yl)).
destruct (hd nil yl); simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
destruct l; simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
destruct l; simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
destruct l; simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
destruct l; simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
set (r := sem_rec (sem g) (sem h0) (sem h1) l xl yl).
assert (l :: xl ++ r :: yl = move_forward 1 (length xl) (l :: r :: xl ++ yl) l) as Hmf.
assert (HA : map (fun ne : BC => sem ne xl nil) rl = map (fun x : BC => Sem (dummies (length xl) (length yl) (BC_to_Cobham (length xl) 0 x)) (xl ++ yl)) rl).
assert (map (fun se : BC => sem se xl yl) tl = map (fun x : BC => Sem (BC_to_Cobham (length xl) (length yl) x) (xl ++ yl)) tl).
rewrite H2, HA, H7; subst; trivial.

Lemma app_prop : forall {A} (l2 l1 : list A) (P : A -> Prop), (fix f (l : list A) : Prop := match l with | nil => True | e :: l' => P e /\ f l' end) l1 -> (fix f (l : list A) : Prop := match l with | nil => True | e :: l' => P e /\ f l' end) l2 -> (fix f (l : list A) : Prop := match l with | nil => True | e :: l' => P e /\ f l' end) (l1 ++ l2).
Lemma plusl_monotonic : forall l (f1 f2 : nat -> nat), (forall x, f1 x <= f2 x) -> plusl (map f1 l) <= plusl (map f2 l).
Lemma BC_to_Cobham_bounded : forall (e : BC) n s, arities e = ok_arities n s -> rec_bounded' (BC_to_Cobham n s e).
change (S n) with (1 + n) in Hl1.

remember ( sem_Rec (Sem (BC_to_Cobham n s g)) (Sem (move_arg (S (S (n + s))) 1 n (BC_to_Cobham (S n) (S s) h0))) (Sem (move_arg (S (S (n + s))) 1 n (BC_to_Cobham (S n) (S s) h1))) l0 ((l1a ++ l1b) ++ l2)) as r.
assert (move_forward 1 n (l0 :: r :: (l1a ++ l1b) ++ l2) l0 = ((l0 :: (l1a ++ l1b)) ++ (r :: l2))).

assert ( maxl (map (@length _) (r :: l2)) <= peval (psum (S n) s) (S (length l0) :: map (@length _) ((l1a ++ l1b) ++ l2)) + (peval (poly_BC n g) (map (@length _) ((l1a ++ l1b) ++ l2)) + length l0 * (peval (poly_BC (S n) h0) (S (length l0) :: map (@length _) ((l1a ++ l1b) ++ l2)) + peval (poly_BC (S n) h1) (S (length l0) :: map (@length _) ((l1a ++ l1b) ++ l2))))).
assert ( peval (poly_BC (S n) h1) (map (@length _) (l0 :: l1a ++ l1b)) <= peval (poly_BC (S n) h1) (S (length l0) :: map (@length _) ((l1a ++ l1b) ++ l2))).
repeat rewrite map_nth2 with (d := nil); simpl; trivial.
assert ( peval (poly_BC (S n) h0) (map (@length _) (l0 :: l1a ++ l1b)) <= peval (poly_BC (S n) h0) (S (length l0) :: map (@length _) ((l1a ++ l1b) ++ l2))).
repeat rewrite map_nth2 with (d := nil); simpl; trivial.
rewrite <- Hl1b, <- Hl2, H5, app_length; simpl; trivial.
rewrite <- Hl1b, <- Hl2, H5, app_length; simpl; trivial.
apply app_prop with (l1 := (map (fun e0 : BC => dummies n s (BC_to_Cobham n 0 e0)) rl)) (l2 := map (BC_to_Cobham n s) tl) (P := rec_bounded').

command: induction (hd nil l); simpl; try (case a); omega.
rewrite H0, length_move_forward, map_length, seq_length, <- beq_nat_refl; simpl.
case_eq (forallb (fun e0 : Arity => arity_eq e0 (ok_arity n)) (map arity (move_forward i j (map (Proj n) (seq 0 n)) (Proj n 0)))); trivial.
rewrite move_forward_map with (d1:=0) in H4 by trivial.
replace (arity (Proj n n'')) with (ok_arity n) in H2.
intros n i j e H; simpl; split; trivial.
rewrite move_forward_map with (d1:=0), in_map_iff in H' by trivial.
destruct H' as [m [H1 _] ]; subst; simpl; trivial.
rewrite <- move_forward_map with (d2:= Sem (Proj n 0) l); trivial.
destruct n' as [ | n']; intro H; simpl; rewrite H; simpl.
case_eq (forallb (fun e0 : Arity => arity_eq e0 (ok_arity (S (n' + n)))) (map arity (map (Proj (S (n' + n))) (seq 1 n')))); intro Hall.
intros e n m H; simpl; split; trivial.
destruct (hd nil yl); simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
destruct l; simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
destruct l; simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
destruct l; simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
destruct l; simpl; trivial; case b; trivial.
set (r := sem_rec (sem g) (sem h0) (sem h1) l xl yl).
assert (l :: xl ++ r :: yl = move_forward 1 (length xl) (l :: r :: xl ++ yl) l) as Hmf.
assert (HA : map (fun ne : BC => sem ne xl nil) rl = map (fun x : BC => Sem (dummies (length xl) (length yl) (BC_to_Cobham (length xl) 0 x)) (xl ++ yl)) rl).
assert (map (fun se : BC => sem se xl yl) tl = map (fun x : BC => Sem (BC_to_Cobham (length xl) (length yl) x) (xl ++ yl)) tl).
rewrite H2, HA, H7; subst; trivial.
